station.stop_info: The bustling heart of the city's public transport network. This grand station offers immediate access to the Financial District's skyscrapers, iconic city landmarks, top-tier hotels, and renowned restaurants. It's the central hub for all Light Rail lines, making it easy to reach virtually any part of the city. Taxis, ride-shares, and numerous city bus routes are available directly outside.
